00006 #directory paths
00007 testdirectory = "../tests/"
00008 resultsdirectory = "../results/"
00009 outputdirectory = "../outputs/"
00010 verifydirectory = "../verify/"
00011 
00012 #ase emt support
00013 emtlist = ['Ni','C','Pt','Ag','H','Al','O','N','Au','Pd','Cu']
00014 emtfcclist = ['Ni','Pt','Ag','Al','Au','Pd','Cu']
00015 potentiallist = ['EMT']#,'GPAW']
00016 potentiallist = ['EMT']
00017 
00018 def runTest(test,potential,el,verbose=True):
00019     testname = test[len(testdirectory):-3]
00020     if verbose:
00021         print "=================================================="
00022         print "Running %s with %s for %s" % ( testname, potential, el)
00023     outputfilename = testname + '.' + potential + '.' + el + '.out'
00024     outputfilepath = outputdirectory + outputfilename
00025     resultfilename = testname + '.' + potential + '.' + el + '.xml'
00026     resultfilepath = resultsdirectory + resultfilename
00027     if verbose:
00028         print 
00029         print "File output... "
00030     start = time.time()
00031     if verbose:
00032         print "EXECUTING: "
00033         print 'python ' + test + ' ' + potential + ' ' + el + ' -w ' + '| tee ' + outputfilepath
00034     outflag = os.system('python ' + test + ' ' + potential + ' ' + el + ' -w ' + '| tee ' + outputfilepath)
00035     if outflag:
00036         os.system('rm ' + outputfilepath)
00037         print "Exception Occured"
00038         return -1
00039     end = time.time()
00040     if verbose:
00041         print 
00042         print "Test completed successfully in %f seconds" % (end-start)
00043         print "Results stored in %s" % resultfilename
00044     return 0 
00045 
00046 def runTests(runAll = False):
00047     print 
00048     print "Test completed successfully in %f seconds" % (end-start)
00049     print "Results stored in %s" % resultfilename
00050     
00051 def runTests(runAll = False, DFT = False):
00052     pipelinestart = time.time()
00053     if runAll:
00054         print "Running a full pipeline, all tests"
00055     if DFT:
00056         potentiallist.append('GPAW')
00057     lstTests = glob.glob(testdirectory + '*.py')
00058     lstTests.remove(testdirectory + 'BaseTest.py')
00059     lstTests.remove(testdirectory + 'NullTest.py')
00060     print lstTests
00061     print "Running pipeline... "
00062     print "There are a total of %d Tests" % (len(lstTests))
00063     for test in lstTests:
00064         testname = test[len(testdirectory):-3]
00065         for potential in potentiallist:
00066             for el in emtlist:
00067                 if runAll:
00068                     runTest(test,potential,el)
00069                 else:
00070                     resultfilename = testname + '.' + potential + '.' + el + '.xml'
00071                     resultfilepath = resultsdirectory + resultfilename
00072                     try:
00073                         fob = open(resultfilepath)
00074                         print "Test configuation for %s already exists..." % resultfilename
00075                     except IOError:
00076                         runTest(test,potential,el)  
00077     pipelinestop = time.time()
00078     
00079     print "Pipeline update finished, took %f seconds " % (pipelinestop-pipelinestart)              
00080             
00081             
00082 if __name__ == '__main__':
00083     runAllFlag = False
00084     DFTFlag = False
00085     for opt in sys.argv:
00086         if opt == '--full':
00087             runAllFlag = True
00088         if opt == '--dft':
00089             DFTFlag = True
00090     runTests(runAll = runAllFlag, DFT = DFTFlag)
